definitions.definition: To take hold of, particularly with the hand.
definitions.example: After a few slips, the tires gripped the pavement.

definitions.definition: To help or assist, particularly in an emotional sense.
To do something with another that makes you happy/gives you relief.
definitions.example: Let’s grip (get a coffee, hang, take a break, see a movie, etc.)

definitions.definition: Pinching and spasmodic pain in the intestines; gripe.
